name: premiering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
premiere
If a show, film, etc. premieres or if it is premiered, the first public performance or showing takes place: The play was premiered in New York. The film will premiere this weekend.
More examplesFewer examplesThe choir will premiere the piece at a concert in the prison.How does it feel to premiere a movie in your hometown? When the movie premiered last winter at the Sundance Film Festival, it took home an award.
